Location: At the Tremaine Park Christmas Tree
Quote: Weather wasn't cooperating much, so when we saw a sunny break, we reached out to as many park families as we could to invite them for cookies, hot chocolate, candy canes, and festive tree decorating fun!

Quote: Colin has been doing this for years now, and we often hear from others that he has inspired them to help the Anselma House specifically, or another charity of their choice. At the Toy Drive we always have a chance to meet new faces, and visit with familiar ones.
